tp.pr2

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr2.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeCard, Fuel, Garbage

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    The superclass of every type of item. It contains the common information for all the items and it defines the interface that the items must match

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String description)
      Builds an item from a given identifier and description

    java.lang.String description)

    • Method Detail

      • canBeUsed

        public abstract boolean canBeUsed()
        Checks if the item can be used. Subclasses must override this method
        Returns:
        true if the item can be used

      • use

        public abstract boolean use(RobotEngine r,
          Place p)
        Try to use the item with a robot in a given place. It returns whether the action was completed. Subclasses must override this method
        Parameters:
        r - The robot that uses the item
        p - The Place where the item is used
        Returns:
        true if the action was completed. Otherwise, it returns false

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Return the item identifier
        Returns:
        The item identifier
